name: Ruby - Basic Setup
description: Minimal Sentry configuration for error tracking in a Ruby application
useCase: Getting started with Sentry error tracking in Ruby
seGuidance: Perfect for Ruby applications just getting started with Sentry. This configuration captures all errors with essential context (environment, release). The SDK automatically captures uncaught exceptions.
configCode:
Sentry.init do |config|
  # Your DSN from Sentry project settings
  config.dsn = 'https://examplePublicKey@o0.ingest.sentry.io/0'
  
  # Identify the environment
  config.environment = 'production'
  
  # Track which version is deployed
  config.release = 'my-ruby-app@1.0.0'
end
